metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3757 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: Moodle 2.0.1 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via adirect request to a .php file, which reveals the installation path in anerror message, as demonstrated by webservice/xmlrpc/locallib.php andcertain other files.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
